title: Nerf Urgot
body: His damage is just too much. On top of his unending autoattack ability...

replies.body: If you buy {{item:3076}} he just kills himself with that "unending autoattack ability"
nah he wont kill himself he will hurt himself yes. but not kill cuz conqueror rulez.

> [{quoted}](name=Corrector1,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=XytNAklf,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-06-03T03:09:51.038+0000)
>
> nah he wont kill himself he will hurt himself yes. but not kill cuz conqueror rulez.

I mean if you don't hit him back as well then yea it won't do much lol. Everytime I go vs Urgot I play a tank (he's supposed to counter them) I rush bramble then when he uses his combo on me and tries to pew pew me his HP just drops

someone just finished being clapped by an Urgot
